Name: Tribu
About the game: Survive .Become the ultimate survivor in the Aurk Valley, a land of danger and mystery. Search for valuable resources to craft weapons, items, and medicine to keep your tribe alive. Explore As the leader of your tribe, explore the vast valley and discover hidden camps of rival tribes. Prosper Build alliances and establish trade routes to grow your tribe's prosperity. And when all else fails, fight for dominance and crush your enemies.
